"Oh, <%me>.<br>What are you doing alone?:
"Ah, I think I know!
You came here to see me, right?
It's so hard being a popular idol."

"...When you say it like that,
it sounds half-hearted and it
hurts me."

"Even when you joke like that,
I would think \"How could you?\""

"Oh, right!
Perhaps you'll be surprised
if I use this form."

"It's been a while since the last
time I have displayed this form.
I've been dismissed from duties."

"I did end up as Vice Commander of the
Intelligence Unit, due to a suggestion
from Casra. However, that's nothing more
than just a title. All there's to do is
just paperwork and approvals."

"If I had to be honest... I was
a bit scared when you came back."

"Perhaps due to the side effects of Mai,
I was told that you might end up
forgetting who I am..."

"But, it's all fine now. You continued
to remember me and never forgot about me."

"Now, I no longer need to fight
so recklessly anymore."

"I prefer singing and dancing
to create smiles in-front of
everyone, rather than fighting.
I love that more than anything."

"Everyone's Idol, Quna,
is forever immortalized!
It's why I'm forever counting
on your support, <%me>!"
